home.title: Smart News Reading & Management Tool
home.description: News Assistant is a powerful news aggregation and reading application that provides personalized news recommendations through intelligent algorithms. It supports offline reading, news bookmarking, multi-platform synchronization, and more, keeping you informed anytime, anywhere.

home.screenshot1_desc: Clean and simple news reading interface

home.features_subtitle: Explore the powerful features of News Assistant to enhance your news reading experience

feature1.title: Smart Recommendations
feature1.description: AI-based personalized news recommendations filter the most relevant content for you.

feature2.title: Offline Reading
feature2.description: Download news anytime, anywhere, and enjoy reading without an internet connection.

feature3.title: Multi-Device Sync
feature3.description: Seamless synchronization between phone, tablet, and computer ensures reading progress is never lost.

home.download_section_desc: News Assistant now supports Windows, macOS, and Android platforms. Click the button below to get the latest version.

features.title: Powerful Features, Excellent Experience
features.subtitle: News Assistant provides a comprehensive news reading and management solution
features.core_features_subtitle: Explore the powerful features of News Assistant

feature1.title: Smart Recommendations
feature1.description: AI-based personalized news recommendations filter the most relevant content. Machine learning continuously optimizes recommendation accuracy to ensure you see only what interests you.

feature2.title: Offline Reading
feature2.description: Download news anytime, anywhere, and enjoy reading without an internet connection. Smart cache management saves data and provides a seamless reading experience.

feature3.title: Multi-Device Sync
feature3.description: Seamless synchronization between phone, tablet, and computer ensures reading progress and bookmarks are updated in real-time, allowing you to switch freely between devices.

feature4.title: Multiple Reading Modes
feature4.description: Provides day, night, eye protection, and other reading modes, supporting custom fonts, font sizes, and spacing to meet different users' reading habits.

feature5.title: Smart Filtering
feature5.description: Powerful content filtering system supports keyword filtering, source filtering, category filtering, and more, creating a clean reading environment.

feature6.title: Reading Statistics
feature6.description: Detailed reading statistics reports help you understand your reading habits, time distribution, and interests to better manage your reading time.

tech1.title: High Performance
tech1.description: Modern technical architecture ensures smooth operation, fast response, and good user experience even on low-end devices.

tech2.title: Data Security
tech2.description: End-to-end encryption technology ensures user data security. All synchronized data is encrypted to protect your privacy.

tech3.title: Cross-Platform Support
tech3.description: Supports multiple platforms including Windows, macOS, and Android, using a unified technology stack to ensure consistent user experience.

download.title: Download News Assistant
download.subtitle: Choose your platform and start using News Assistant
download.choose_platform_desc: News Assistant supports multiple operating systems
download.installation_guide_desc: Follow these steps to install News Assistant
download.step1_desc: Click the download button for your platform to get the installation file
download.step2_desc: Open the downloaded file and follow the prompts to complete installation
download.step3_desc: After installation, launch from Start Menu or Applications folder
download.step4_desc: Complete initial setup wizard and start enjoying News Assistant
download.faq_desc: Common issues during download and installation
download.faq1_q: What if download speed is slow?
download.faq1_a: Try changing network environment or using a download manager. We also provide multiple mirror download sources.
download.faq2_q: Blocked by security software during installation?
download.faq2_a: Add News Assistant to your security software's trusted list, or temporarily disable security software during installation.
download.faq3_a: On Windows, use Control Panel's Programs and Features. On macOS, simply drag the app to Trash.
download.faq4_a: News Assistant supports Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean and more languages. Switch in settings.
